skills.name: Basic Attack
description: [[Basic Attack|{{sbc|Basic Attack:}}]] '''Jhin''' fires at the target with {{ai|Whisper}}, dealing {{as|100% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} and applying {{tip|on-hit}} effects.

'''Jhin's''' basic attacks can {{tip|critically strike}} and these attacks have slightly increased missile speed, but only deal {{ft|{{as|{{#vardefine:Jhincrit1|{{#expr:(175)*{{ccd|Jhin|crit_mod}}}}}}{{#vardefine:Jhincrit2|{{#expr:{{ccd|Jhin|crit_mod}}*100}}}}{{critical damage|{{#var:Jhincrit1}}|{{#var:Jhincrit2}}}} AD}} {{as|physical damage}}.|86% of the {{sti|{{as|critical damage}}}} champions usually have.}}
'''Jhin's''' {{as|attack speed}} cannot be improved at all except through [[growth]].
skills.descriptionHtml:
Basic Attack Jhin fires at the target with undefined's Whisper, dealing 100% AD physical damage and applying on-hit effects.
Jhin's basic attacks can critically strike and these attacks have slightly increased missile speed, but only deal
Jhin's attack speed cannot be improved at all except through growth.
skills.notes: * The 3000 missile speed for critical strikes also applies to {{ais|Whisper|Jhin}} 4th shot, which is a guaranteed critical strike.

skills.name: Whisper
skills.blurb: Jhin's hand cannon, Whisper, is a precise instrument designed to deal superior damage. It fires at a fixed rate and carries only four shots. Jhin imbues the final bullet with dark magics to critically strike and deal bonus execute damage. Whenever Whisper crits, it inspires Jhin with a burst of movement speed.
description: {{sbc|Innate - Death In 4 Acts:}} '''Jhin's''' [[basic attack]]s consume [[ammunition]] for 4 rounds. He will {{tt|reload|Jhin is unable to declare basic attacks during this time.}} over {{fd|2.5}} seconds immediately after expending all rounds or withholding leftover rounds after 10 seconds of being [[out of combat]] and not being affected by {{tip|crowd control}}. The latter reload can be interrupted by declaring an attack or casting an ability.

'''Jhin's''' final round attack has an {{tip|uncancelable windup}} versus champions, always {{tip|critically strike|critically strikes}} its target, including {{tip|turrets|structures}}, and also deals {{as|{{pp|key=%|15 to 25 for 3|1 to 11}} of the target's {{sti|'''missing''' health}}}} as {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} to non-structures.

{{sbc|Innate - Every Moment Matters:}} '''Jhin''' gains {{as|{{pp|key=%|4;5;6;7;8;9;10;11;12;14;16;20;24;28;32;36;40;44|formula = 3% + 1% per level up to 9, then + 2% up to 11, then + 4% up to 18}}|attack damage}}{{ft|{{as|(+ {{fd|0.3}}% per 1% critical strike chance)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|0.25}}% per 1% '''bonus''' attack speed)}}|{{as|(+ 30% of his critical strike chance)}} {{as|(+ 25% of his '''bonus''' attack speed)}}}} {{as|AD}} as {{sti|ad|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}}.
Additionally, {{tip|critical strikes}} grant '''Jhin''' {{as|10%|movement speed}} {{as|(+ {{fd|0.4}}% per 1% '''bonus''' attack speed)}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Death In 4 Acts: Jhin's basic attacks consume ammunition for 4 rounds. He will reload over 2.5 seconds immediately after expending all rounds or withholding leftover rounds after 10 seconds of being out of combat and not being affected by crowd control. The latter reload can be interrupted by declaring an attack or casting an ability.
Jhin's final round attack has an uncancelable windup versus champions, always critically strikes its target, including structures, and also deals 1 to 11 ‒ undefined of the target's missing health as bonus physical damage to non-structures.
Innate - Every Moment Matters: Jhin gains 4;5;6;7;8;9;10;11;12;14;16;20;24;28;32;36;40;44% − undefined% (based on level) AD as bonus attack damage.
Additionally, critical strikes grant Jhin 10% (+ 0.4% per 1% bonus attack speed) bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
skills.notes:
* The penalty to '''Jhin's''' {{as|critical damage}} also reduces the base damage ((100 + 75){{times}}0.86 rather than 100 + (75{{times}}0.86) and stacks with other sources (i.e {{ii|Infinity Edge}}) ((100 + 75 + 35){{times}}0.86).
** This penalty does not affect {{ai|Curtain Call|Jhin}}.
* The {{as|{{sti|'''missing''' health}}}} damage benefits from {{sti|life steal}}.
* The 4th attack cannot be canceled by '''Jhin''' himself.
* The 4th attack versus a structure is classified as a critical strike.
* The attack damage multiplier stacks additively with {{bi|Dragon Slayer|Dragon Slayer's}}.
* ''Every Moment Matters' '' bonus {{as|AD}} will benefit from any amount of {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}, even in excess of an amount that would usually reach the attacks per second cap ({{fd|2.5}}).
** The maximum modifier without attack speed is 74%.
*** 44% base modifier at level 18.
*** 30% from critical strike chance on account of the 100% cap.
*** [[Attack speed#Reducing attack speed|Attack speed slows]] will not affect '''Jhin's''' bonus attack damage from his passive and will ignore his attack speed as it is fixed.
* Attack damage reductions apply before the multiplier causing them to be stronger against '''Jhin''' than advertised or versus other champions.
skills.flavorsound: {{sm2|Jhin_Original_PassiveAttackBuff_4.ogg|''"One, two, three, four, two, two, three, four."''}}

skills.name: Dancing Grenade
skills.blurb: Jhin launches a magical cartridge at an enemy. It can hit up to four targets and gains damage each time its targets die.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jhin''' launches a canister at the target enemy, dealing them {{as|physical damage}}. The canister then bounces to up to three additional nearby enemies beyond the first, dealing them the same damage.
The damage is increased by 35% of the '''base''' damage if the target the grenade last bounced off of dies shortly after being hit.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Jhin launches a canister at the target enemy, dealing them physical damage. The canister then bounces to up to three additional nearby enemies beyond the first, dealing them the same damage.
The damage is increased by 35% of the base damage if the target the grenade last bounced off of dies shortly after being hit.
skills.notes: * {{tip|Spell shield}} will not prevent the canister from bouncing.

effects.str:
• Minimum Physical Damage: (+ % AD) (+ 60% AP)
  • Maximum Damage: Error: SyntaxError: Unexpected end of input (+ Error: SyntaxError: Unexpected end of input% AD) (+ % AP)

st_slices: Error: SyntaxError: Unexpected end of input (+ Error: SyntaxError: Unexpected end of input% AD) (+ % AP)

skills.name: Deadly Flourish
skills.blurb: Jhin brandishes his cane, firing a single shot with incredible range. It pierces through minions and monsters, but stops on the first champion hit. If the target was recently struck by Jhin's allies, lotus traps, or basic attacks, they are rooted.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Enemy {{tip|champions}} who cross over a ''{{ai|Captive Audience|Jhin|Lotus Trap}}'' or are [[damage]]d by '''Jhin''' or allied champions are ''marked'' for 4 seconds.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Jhin''' fires a shot in the target direction that deals {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies in a line until colliding with an enemy champion, reduced by 25% against non-champions.
Hitting a ''marked'' champion {{tip|root|roots}} them for a duration and grants '''Jhin''' {{ais|Whisper|Jhin|Every Moment Matters}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Enemy champions who cross over a Jhin's Lotus Trap or are damaged by Jhin or allied champions are marked for 4 seconds.
Active: Jhin fires a shot in the target direction that deals physical damage to all enemies in a line until colliding with an enemy champion, reduced by 25% against non-champions.
Hitting a marked champion roots them for a duration and grants Jhin Jhin's Whisper bonus movement speed.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|50 to 190}} {{as|(+ 50% AD)}}|Non-Champion Damage|{{ap|50*0.75 to 190*0.75}} {{as|(+ {{fd|37.5}}% AD)}}}}
skills.notes:
* Applies {{tip|spell damage}} to the enemy champion and {{tip|area damage}} to all other enemy units.
* The ''Caught Out'' mark only appears if ''Deadly Flourish'' can potentially {{tip|root}} the target, and will not if the ability's cooldown is longer than 4 seconds or isn't ranked up.
* ''Deadly Flourish'' will fire from wherever '''Jhin''' was at the start of the cast time.
* ''Deadly Flourish'' is blocked by {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} but not {{ai|Blade Whirl|Samira}}.
** It does not actually fire a missile but appears as if it did, which is why it is special cased to work with Wind Wall.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 50% AD)
  • Non-Champion Damage: (+ 37.5% AD)

skills.name: Captive Audience
skills.effect_radius: {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} {{tt|260|Trap sight radius}} / {{tt|260|On-trigger reveals and explosion radius}}
skills.blurb: Jhin places an invisible lotus trap that blooms when walked over. It slows nearby enemies before dealing damage with an explosion of serrated petals. Beauty in Death - When Jhin kills an enemy champion, a lotus trap will bloom near their corpse.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Jhin''' periodically [[stock]]s a ''Lotus Trap'' charge, up to a maximum of 2.
{{sbc|Passive - Beauty in Death:}} {{tip|Takedown|Takedowns}} on enemy {{tip|champions}} summon a free ''Blooming Lotus Trap'' under them.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Jhin''' places a ''Lotus Trap'' at the target location which, upon landing, becomes {{tip|stealthed trap|stealthed}} after arming over 1 second, lasting for up to 180 seconds and granting {{tip|sight}} within its radius. The ''Lotus Trap Blooms'' upon enemy contact, with enemies in the area at the time of its trigger becoming {{tip|sight|revealed}} for 4 seconds.

''Blooming Lotus Traps'' {{tip|slow}} enemies within the area by 35% for 2 seconds before detonating, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies caught in the explosion. ''Lotus Traps'' deal 65% damage against non-champions and {{tip|champions}} who have been struck by another ''Lotus Trap'' in the last 1 second.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Jhin periodically stocks a Lotus Trap charge, up to a maximum of 2.
Passive - Beauty in Death: Takedowns on enemy champions summon a free Blooming Lotus Trap under them.
Active: Jhin places a Lotus Trap at the target location which, upon landing, becomes stealthed after arming over 1 second, lasting for up to 180 seconds and granting sight within its radius. The Lotus Trap Blooms upon enemy contact, with enemies in the area at the time of its trigger becoming revealed for 4 seconds.
Blooming Lotus Traps slow enemies within the area by 35% for 2 seconds before detonating, dealing magic damage to all enemies caught in the explosion. Lotus Traps deal 65% damage against non-champions and champions who have been struck by another Lotus Trap in the last 1 second.
skills.notes:
* The ''Lotus Trap'' will stop upon encountering a {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} or {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}}.
* ''Beauty in Death'' does not trigger after killing a {{tip|clone}}.
* The reveal debuff is named [[File: Caught Out.png|20px|link=]] ''Caught Out''.
** This debuff is shared between ''Captive Audience'' and {{ai|Curtain Call|Jhin}}.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 120% AD) (+ 100% AP)
  • Reduced Damage: (+ 78% AD) (+ 65% AP)

skills.name: Curtain Call
skills.blurb: Jhin channels, transforming Whisper into a shoulder-mounted mega-cannon. It is able to fire 4 super shots at extreme range that pierce through minions and monsters, but stop on the first champion impacted. Whisper cripples enemies hit, which slows them and deals execute damage. The 4th shot is perfectly crafted, epically powerful, and guaranteed to critically strike.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jhin''' {{tip|channel|channels}} for up to 10 seconds, transforming his weapon into a powerful cannon, {{tip|sight|revealing}} himself and gaining the ability to recast ''Curtain Call'' up to 4 times within its duration.

{{sbc|Recast:}} After {{fd|0.25}} seconds, '''Jhin''' fires a round in the target direction that grants {{tip|sight}} around its trajectory for {{fd|0.5}} seconds and deals {{as|physical damage}}, which is increased by {{as|{{pp|type=target's '''missing''' health|key=%|key1=%|0 to 300 for 11|0 to 100|formula=3% per 1% of target's '''missing''' health.}}}}, to all enemies in a line until colliding with an enemy {{tip|champion}}, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 80% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds, and {{tip|sight|revealing}} them for 2 seconds. Each cast has a {{tt|static cooldown|Unaffected by ability haste}} of 1 second.
The fourth shot {{tip|critical strike|critically strikes}} for {{as|{{critical damage|100}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Jhin channels for up to 10 seconds, transforming his weapon into a powerful cannon, revealing himself and gaining the ability to recast Curtain Call up to 4 times within its duration.
Recast: After 0.25 seconds, Jhin fires a round in the target direction that grants sight around its trajectory for 0.5 seconds and deals physical damage, which is increased by 0 to 100 ‒ undefined, to all enemies in a line until colliding with an enemy champion, slowing them by 80% for 0.5 seconds, and revealing them for 2 seconds. Each cast has a static cooldown of 1 second.
The fourth shot critically strikes for (+ IE 25%) bonus physical damage.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Damage|{{ap|50 to 200}} {{as|(+ 20% AD)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|50*4 to 200*4}} {{as|(+ 80% AD)}}}}
skills.notes:
* Applies {{tip|spell damage}} to enemy champions and {{tip|area damage}} to other enemy units.
*Each cast counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* ''Curtain Call's'' shooting range is fixed in front of '''Jhin'''.
* The opening sound effect and area of range are audible and visible to both teams.
* Leveling up the ability while channeling will change the final cooldown.
* '''Jhin''' will turn to face in the target direction whenever he uses a recast.
* '''Jhin''' gains a wider field of view during ''Curtain Call''.
* The reveal debuff is named [[File: Caught Out.png|20px|link=]] ''Caught Out''.
** This debuff is shared between {{ai|Captive Audience|Jhin}} and ''Curtain Call''.
<!--Bullet travel speed approx 3200? -->
